text: Fantastic to see an idea only thought of yesterday make @BBCNews at Ten tonight. The power of #disabled people & their allies in action.  Thank you @FoxNikkiFox  If you'd still like to sign up please do https://t.co/dolSS5X8aT #COVID19 https://t.co/HbvDX6tpW7
